Is there such a thing as too much fame?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Is there such a thing as too much fame?
By ShadowFusion on Thursday, May 30, 2002 - 11:13 am:

I just noticed something odd about CandyBug, my dummie/cash cow. I was looking as his stats and, well, it looks like this now, respectively:

Result: 158 Match 157 Win 1 Lost
Prize Money:335000 G Fame:

His fame disappeared! And i can't figure out why.
All he has been doing is battling in the Big 5 tournies, nothing else. When he wasn't fighting he was hibernating, unless i was resting him to get rid of fatigue. Now and again i would feed him Honey Candy, he loves those things like an addict. He is now 3 years 8 months, and has been fighting the Big 5 since he was 2 years 5 months, and MAN, has he gotten me a lot of money. After fighting i tell him "As expected" and he almost always does not care, sometimes he is happy though.

Enough of me, anyone else have this happen or have any ideas?

By ShadowFusion on Friday, May 31, 2002 - 10:00 am:

Just wanted to mention, One week after i noticed CandyBug's fame had disappeared, he died. It might be coincidence, might not be.

Perhaps some one, anyone, has a responce or an idea... o_o;;

By torey_luvullo on Friday, May 31, 2002 - 06:10 pm:

hmmm - i never noticed this. wonder if it happens regularly?

By torey_luvullo on Sunday, June 2, 2002 - 10:02 am:

as for the "fame disappearing a week before death angle", it didnt work on my golem, FFF [i have long since run out of decent names for my dummies]. the last months of his life i checked every week, and he was a superstar right up until the moment of his death.

btw, i didn't brood over it for long - i went and got another monster at the shrine. thanx for the advice, fleria!
